mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NUMBER certNo, ITEM_NUMBER itemNo, ITEM_NAME itemName, BRAND_NAME brdName, SEASON_REASON reason, STATUS status FROM AP_STATISTIC ORDER BY certNo
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, to_char(START_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') START_DATE, to_char(END_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') END_DATE FROM AP_SCHEDULE
select count(SEX) from AP_USERS where sex = 'M'
select count(SEX) from AP_USERS where sex = 'F'
select seq, title, content, content,to_char(start_date, 'MM') mon, to_char(start_date, 'DD') day, int_name from AP_SCHEDULE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AP_SCHEDULE(SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, INT_DATE, INT_NAME) VALUES(ldk_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, sysdate, #{int_name})
